title: Unranked Draft mode?
body:
Just wondering if anyone can tell me why oceanic servers do not have an unranked draft mode?
I started playing the game on the American servers and unlocked it there but for some reason there is no option to play it on oceanic?
Is it because i need to do something to unlock it or is it just only available for play on in the America's?

replies.body:
Hey there,

OCE does not currently have a normal draft pick queue, however the potential for new queues to be added is constantly being evaluated.

For a list of currently available queues and what times they're live, check out [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZzQR1haM-queue-schedule-updated).
